name: Using Search
description: Master the documentation search to find components, composables, and guides quickly.

steps.title: Search Button
steps.task: This is the search button. It opens the search panel where you can find components, composables, and guides.
steps.hint: Keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac)

steps.title: Search Input
steps.task: This is where you type your search query. Results update instantly as you type.
steps.hint: Arrow keys navigate results, Enter selects.

steps.title: Favorite Results
steps.task: The star icon adds a result to your favorites. Favorites appear at the top when search is empty for quick access.

steps.title: Ask AI
steps.task: This button navigates to the page and asks AI about the topic. Great for getting a quick overview.
steps.learn: What the Ask AI button does

steps.title: Dismiss Results
steps.task: The X icon hides a result for the current session. Useful for filtering out irrelevant matches.

steps.title: Search History
steps.task: Recent searches appear here when the search field is empty. History persists between sessions.

steps.title: Favorited!
steps.task: We just added Tabs to your favorites. Notice it now appears at the top for quick access anytime you open search.

steps.title: You're a Search Pro!
steps.task: That covers the search features. Use Ctrl+K anytime to quickly find what you need.
steps.learn: Ready to search like a pro
